name: woo-headless-ecommerce
description: E-commerce headless com WooCommerce e Next.js

scripts.wp:install: cd wordpress && wp core download && wp config create --dbname=woo_headless --dbuser=root --dbpass= --dbhost=localhost
scripts.wp:setup: cd wordpress && wp core install --url=localhost:8080 --title='WooCommerce Store' --admin_user=admin --admin_password=admin --admin_email=admin@example.com
scripts.wp:woocommerce: cd wordpress && wp plugin install woocommerce --activate
scripts.db:setup: mysql -u root -e 'CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS woo_headless;'
scripts.setup:all: npm run db:setup && npm run wp:install && npm run wp:setup && npm run wp:woocommerce && npm install
